1.0.name: wordpress/esse-captcha
1.0.description:
This plugin is just a simple captcha that appears when an unregistered user try to register or to leave a comment.

Esse-Captcha is a software written by Stefano Gabryel http://www.stefano-workshop.eu Version: 1.0
